subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Ivan Basso, an Italian riding for the Liquigas team, won the 15th stage of the Giro d’Italia, launching a solo attack on the grueling climb up Monte Zoncolan.
snippet: Ivan Basso, an Italian riding for the Liquigas team, won the 15th stage of the Giro d’Italia, launching a solo attack on the grueling climb up Monte Zoncolan.
